messages.content:
Next Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

__Votes__:
Irksome Blow (Gremlins card): 4
Misdirect (Collector card): 2
Stupend (Gremlins card): 1

embeds.title: Automa-Beam
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 2 :energy_champ: / Boss / Downfall

Deal 26 (34) damage to ALL enemies.
Next turn, lose :energy_champ:.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: I HATE SLAVERS I HATE REPTOMANCER I HATE GREMLIN LEADER I HATE TRI JAW WORM
takes away an energy next turn, but who cares?
well, rarely, it can matter. notably in single enemy fights with only 3 energy

embeds.title: No Holds Barred
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 2 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Deal 19 (23) damage and apply 5 (6) **Bruise** :p_bruise: to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 less :energy_hermit:  next turn.

messages.content: i will definitely be playing more attacks this turn
All you can really do with it is either <called shot> or <cursed weapon>

embeds.title: Called Shot
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 0 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

 (**Retain**.)
Deal 5 (7) damage.
If the last card played this turn triggered Dead On, draw a card.

embeds.title: Cursed Weapon
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 (0) :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Lose 2 HP.
Deal 10 damage.
**Curse**d Weapons permanently deal 1 more damage. **Exhaust**.

messages.content: Spoon would go hard on a cursed weapon deck
ahh yes, the better version of <hyperbeam automaton>

embeds.title: HYPER BEAM
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 1 :energy_auto: / The Automaton / Downfall

Deal 25 (35) damage to ALL enemies.
Put 5 Void on top of your draw pile.

messages.content: Of all the different card iterations of the giant laser beam in downfall, this is certainly one of them
It does combo with the minor debuff removal theme, but that is mostly for smoothing over its downside in the fights where this isn't the card you want
Which is most of act 3 and all bosses
I would never dream of taking this in act 3
I didn't even read carefully enough I thought this was the guardian card

embeds.title: Giga Beam
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 3 :energy_guardian: / The Guardian / Downfall

Deal 36 (40) damage to ALL enemies.
**Strength** :p_strength: affects this card 2 (4) times.
Skip your next turn.

messages.content: Yeah that one the downside actually needs mitigation
This one you can just power through
I really like when I get this card from tiny slime hat boss power relic
But I have not often taken this in a shop, so in theory is should be pretty hoof

embeds.title: Immolate
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 2 :red_energy: / The Ironclad / Slay the Spire

Deal 21 (28) damage to ALL enemies.
Add a Burn into your discard pile.

messages.content: the main difference being that this hits way harder but with a worse drawback. Generally your playing this card on the last or second to last turn of the fight so the energy drop wont matter very much; expect for when you see the card in the early game and choose not to playi t

since this does so much damage it end ups being very good on every character; especially hermit who for some reason can get boss potions and tiny bowler hat when he really shouldn't. This obviously gets even better when it costs 0 from study the spire; but its more then worth using at 2 cost

embeds.title: Gambit
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 1 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Put 2 (3) random Attacks from your discard pile into your hand. They cost 1 less this turn.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: no holds barred is deceptively strong; its really good at basically all stages of the game since it scales so well and has good frontloaded damage for the first few acts

for reference playing if you have 4 energy and play holds barred once, then again with gambit you deal at minimal 43 AOE damage and theres 10 bruise on every enemy, with an upgrade on no holds barred its 52 damage and even more potential damage
in other words you just delete slavers; even if you don't draw it at the same time as gambit (although that is realistic if you try using retain from coalescence and cheat)
also remember hermit has memento, aka discount wrath
